UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Rule-based omics mining reveals antimicrobial macrocyclic peptides against drug-resistant clinical isolates
Literature.Author: Cheng Z, He BB, Lei K, Gao Y, Shi Y, Zhong Z, Liu H, Liu R, Zhang H, Wu S, Zhang W, Tang X, Li YX

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>64µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus DSM 1790(MIC=>64µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis 168(MIC=>64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis OG1RF(MIC=>64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium MCC 2763(MIC=>64µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>64µg/ml)
